SlayByDay:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
SlayByDay:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

SlayByDay:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
SlayByDay:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
SlayByDay:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

SlayByDay:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
SlayByDay:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

SlayByDay:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
SlayByDay:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !SlayByDay:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

SlayByDay:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
SlayByDay:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !SlayByDay:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

SlayByDay:Synchronize.NAME: Synchronize
SlayByDay:Synchronize.DESCRIPTION: When you swap to Reason mode, draw !M! card. NL When you swap to Passion mode, gain !M! strength, and at the end of this turn, lose !M! strength.
SlayByDay:Synchronize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you swap to Reason mode, draw !M! cards. NL When you swap to Passion mode, gain !M! strength, and at the end of this turn, lose !M! strength.

Prediction.NAME: Prediction
Prediction.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Next turn, gain !B! block. NL Switches into Feather Shield.
Prediction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Next turn, gain !B! block. NL Switches into Feather Shield+.

FeatherShield.NAME: Feather Shield
FeatherShield.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain !B! block. NL Switches into Prediction.
FeatherShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain !B! block. NL Switches into Prediction+.

DefensiveManeuvers.NAME: Defensive Maneuvers
DefensiveManeuvers.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain !B! block. Next turn, draw !M! additional cards. NL Switches into Offensive Rush.
DefensiveManeuvers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain !B! block. Next turn, draw !M! additional cards. NL Switches into Offensive Rush+.

OffensiveRush.NAME: Offensive Rush
OffensiveRush.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Switches into Defensive Maneuvers.
OffensiveRush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Switches into Defensive Maneuvers+.

EvilEye.NAME: Evil Eye
EvilEye.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Apply !M! weak and vulnerable. NL Switches into Piercing Gaze.
EvilEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Apply !M! weak and vulnerable. NL Switches into Piercing Gaze+.

PiercingGaze.NAME: Piercing Gaze
PiercingGaze.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Switches into Evil Eye.
PiercingGaze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Switches into Evil Eye+.

MagicDefense.NAME: Anti-Hex Amulet
MagicDefense.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain !M! artifact. Exhaust. NL Switches into Sharpen Feathers.
MagicDefense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain !M! artifact. Exhaust. NL Switches into Sharpen Feathers+.

SharpenFeathers.NAME: Sharpen Feathers
SharpenFeathers.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain !M! thorns. Exhaust. NL Switches into Anti-Hex Amulet.
SharpenFeathers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain !M! thorns. Exhaust. NL Switches into Anti-Hex Amulet+.

ClawSlash.NAME: Claw Slash
ClawSlash.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! vulnerable. NL Switches into Claw Bash.
ClawSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! vulnerable. NL Switches into Claw Bash+.

ClawSmash.NAME: Claw Bash
ClawSmash.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Switches into Claw Slash.
ClawSmash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Switches into Claw Slash+.

Recollect.NAME: Recollect
Recollect.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Put a card from your exhaust pile into your draw pile. NL Switches into Forget.
Recollect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Put a card from your exhaust pile into your draw pile. NL Switches into Forget+.

Forget.NAME: Forget
Forget.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain !M! strength and !M! Dexterity. Exhaust a random card in your hand. NL Switches into Recollect.
Forget.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain !M! strength and !M! Dexterity. Exhaust a random card in your hand. NL Switches into Recollect+.

Hone.NAME: Hone
Hone.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat. NL Switches into Lacerate.
Hone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat. NL Switches into Lacerate+.

Lacerate.NAME: Lacerate
Lacerate.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Switches into Hone.
Lacerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Switches into Hone+.

Punishment.NAME: Punishment
Punishment.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Consume all debuffs on target. Deal !D! damage per debuff consumed. NL Switches into Fury.
Punishment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Consume all debuffs on target. Deal !D! damage per debuff consumed. NL Switches into Fury+.

Fury.NAME: Fury
Fury.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Lose all strength. Deal !M! damage for each strength lost. NL Switches into Punishment.
Fury.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Lose all strength. Deal !M! damage for each strength lost. NL Switches into Punishment+.

SplashDamage.NAME: Splash Damage
SplashDamage.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Whenever a potion is consumed, deal !M! damage to all enemies. NL Switches into Power Up.
SplashDamage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Whenever a potion is consumed, deal !M! damage to all enemies. NL Switches into Power Up+.

PowerUp.NAME: Power Up
PowerUp.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Whenever you gain strength, gain !M! additional strength. NL Switches into Splash Damage.
PowerUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Whenever you gain strength, gain !M! additional strength. NL Switches into Splash Damage+.

TacticalRetreat.NAME: Tactical Retreat
TacticalRetreat.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain !B! block. Lose !M! vulnerable. NL Switches into Blitz.
TacticalRetreat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain !B! block. Lose !M! vulnerable. NL Switches into Blitz+.

Blitz.NAME: Blitz
Blitz.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Deal !D! damage. Lose all your block. NL Switches into Tactical Retreat.
Blitz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Deal !D! damage. Lose all your block. NL Switches into Tactical Retreat+.

Bolster.NAME: Bolster
Bolster.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Increase this card's block by !M! this combat. NL Switches into Guard.
Bolster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Increase this card's block by !M! this combat. NL Switches into Guard+.

Guard.NAME: Guard
Guard.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain !B! block. NL Switches into Bolster.
Guard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain !B! block. NL Switches into Bolster+.

Fly.NAME: Fly
Fly.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain flight for one turn. NL Switches into Roost.
Fly.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain flight for one turn. NL Switches into Roost+.

Roost.NAME: Roost
Roost.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. Deal damage equal to your Dexterity. (Deals !D! damage.) NL Switches into Fly.
Roost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. Deal damage equal to your Dexterity. (Deals !D! damage.) NL Switches into Fly+.

Resupply.NAME: Resupply
Resupply.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain X Refill until end of turn. Exhaust. NL Switches into Resurgence.
Resupply.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Gain X+1 Refill until end of turn. Exhaust. NL Switches into Resurgence+.

Resurgence.NAME: Resurgence
Resurgence.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain 1 Strength, Dexterity, or Thorns (at random) X times. Exhaust. NL Switches into Resupply.
Resurgence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Gain 1 Strength, Dexterity, or Thorns (at random) X+1 times. Exhaust. NL Switches into Resupply+.

Possession.NAME: Possession
Possession.DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Switch into Spirit form.
Possession.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Human. NL Switch into Spirit form.

Expulsion.NAME: Expulsion
Expulsion.DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Switch into Human form.
Expulsion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spirit. NL Switch into Human form.
